info.title: triveous-Ecommerce-API
info.description: Welcome to our E-Commerce project! This project is built using Node.js and Express and serves as an e-commerce platform. This Documentation provides an overview of the API routes available in the application

bearer_token_Auth.description: add your JWT token here, it will be prefixed with 'Bearer '

bearer_refresh_token_Auth.description: add your JWT refresh token here, it will be prefixed with 'Bearer '
